channel.title: Comments on: What Is Blocking YOUR Success?

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: LOL. That makes me laugh! Great visual. :)
item.content:encoded: LOL. That makes me laugh! Great visual. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: L Adams
item.dc:creator: L Adams
item.description: There was no meditation. However, I had to chuckle over the parental block. I've said when I go shopping that I have an "angel" on each shoulder. On one side is my mom: "Do you really need that? How many times are you going to wear it? Can you afford it? and on the other, her cousin & best friend, my "aunt" Evie: "Don't listen to her. If you want it you should get it. If you don't, you know you will be sorry later."
item.content:encoded: There was no meditation. However, I had to chuckle over the parental block. I’ve said when I go shopping that I have an “angel” on each shoulder. On one side is my mom: “Do you really need that? How many times are you going to wear it? Can you afford it? and on the other, her cousin & best friend, my “aunt” Evie: “Don’t listen to her. If you want it you should get it. If you don’t, you know you will be sorry later.”
